transcription: This project is a replacement of an old intersection at Redwood Road and Bangor Highway. The project consisted of changing the old intersection to a full interchange. One of our strategic goals is mobility. We're trying to eliminate as much as possible of the stop and go. Transportation is the lifeblood of our local communities. By taking out the old intersections and  and the stop and go and so on. It eliminated some of the safety issues with the older intersections. The Utah Department of Transportation, they have shown great collaboration with our local governments. We're so grateful for the leadership in UDOT over the last 25 years that has got us to the point today where Utah's Department of Transportation is the example for the rest of the nation. We have more innovation  in Utah Department of Transportation than any state in the nation.
